name: activitypub-adapter
description: Send notice to Mastodon SocialWeb. See: https://github.com/rzr/mastodon-lite
author: Philippe Coval

name: broadlink-adapter
description: Support IR devices with BroadLink. See: https://github.com/sogaani/broadlink-adapter
author: sogaani

name: date-time-adapter
description: A DateTime adapter to create more advanced rules using sunrise, sunset, weekends, etc.
author: tomasy

name: email-sender-adapter
description: Simple email sending actions. Needs to be configured with email and app password.
author: Mozilla IoT

name: flic-button-adapter
description: React to Flic button presses via proprietary flic daemon (included for Linux)
author: Martin Giger

name: maxsmart2-adapter
description: Control Max Hauri maxSMART 2.0 smart plugs. Does not support automatic pairing.
author: Martin Giger

name: mysensors-adapter
description: Build your own smart home with this Arduino library
author: CreateCandle

name: netatmo-weather-adapter
description: Netatmo weather station support. Requires Netatmo Smart Home API credentials.
author: Martin Giger

name: network-presence-detection-adapter
description: Check if devices are on your network
author: Flatsiedatsie

name: openuv-adapter
description: Get the current uv index from www.openuv.io
author: Tim Hellhake

name: philips-hue-adapter
description: Philips Hue color light support. Press the button on your Hue bridge to pair devices.
author: Mozilla IoT

name: sengled-adapter
description: Sengled Wi-Fi smart bulb device support
author: Mozilla IoT

name: slack-adapter
description: Send slack messages to your workspace
author: Tim Hellhake

name: telegram-sender-adapter
description: Simple telegram sending actions. Needs to be configured with chatid and token.
author: ne0bot

name: tide-calendar-adapter
description: Tide calendar and current water level
author: Mozilla IoT

name: timer-adapter
description: Runs for the specified number of seconds
author: Tim Hellhake

name: twilio-adapter
description: Simple Twilio API actions. Needs to be configured with an account SID, auth token, and Twilio-given number.
author: Mozilla IoT

name: virtual-things-adapter
description: Virtual Things for experimenting with new thing types
author: Mozilla IoT

name: voice-addon
description: Hands-free voice addon with personalized keyword and local voice processing.
author: André Natal

name: x10-cm11-adapter
description: X10 device support through the CM11 interface.
author: Alan Thiessen

name: zigbee-conbee-adapter
description: Uses deCONZ REST API to manage ConBee USB stick
author: tomasy
